item.title: RabbitMQ - SQL Server
item.description: A week or two ago I came across a post on the RabbitMQ Users forum, about how to communicate from SQL Server to RabbitMQ. Seeing that we do that a lot at Derivco, I came with some suggestions, and also said that I was writing a blog-post about how it can be done. The part of writing was not entirely correct - at least not until now (sorry Jim, it’s been hectic at work).
